LightningComponentBundle.description: This component allows you to show the remaining characters in your text fields

property.name: sectionHeader
property.description: The header that you would like to be displayed at the top of the component

property.name: fieldSetName
property.description: This is the name of a field set on the object that holds the fields you would like to display

property.name: iconName
property.description: This is the name the icon you would like to display in the independent component's lightning card. There is a list available here: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: characterWarningThreshold
property.description: The number that you place here determines when the red warning text starts to display in the character counting component.

property.name: fieldColumns
property.description: This determines how many columns you would like your fields to display in.

property.name: renderEditButton
property.description: If you would like to allow users to be able to edit fields using this component set this to true. This is primarily turned off for component composition.

property.name: renderSaveButton
property.description: If you would like to allow users to be able to save their edited fields using this component set this to true. This is primarily turned off for component composition.

property.name: displayAsFieldSection
property.description: If you would like this component to display itself like a field section on a page layout would, check this box

property.name: displayAsIndependentSection
property.description: If you would like this component to display itself like an independent component in the lightning page, check this box
